column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant | Participants # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=Back in December of last year , I flew to Omaha , Nebraska to visit family for a week during Christmas .

#text=After packing what I needed , I took the bus to the airport where I had to get my ticket , go through security , get my suitcase checked , and find my way to the terminal to wait until the called for people to board my flight .
#text=When I got on the airplane , I put my luggage in the overhead and took my seat that was fortunately near the window .

#text=Once everyone was on the plane , the flight attendant announced that we were ready for take off and instructed all of us to fasten our seat belts , turn off our electronics , and read the safety manual .
#text=Then the pilot told us that he was about to take off and we then were finally flying in the sky .
#text=During my flight I sat next to an older woman and her dog that she was allowed to keep on her lap .
#text=We talked throughout the flight while snacking on the peanuts and soda that were given to us .

#text=When we finally landed about three or four hours later , we all exited the plane in a single file line while grabbing our belongings and once I was off of the plane , I went to go find my aunt who was suppose to pick me up .
